articles.description: On Sunday, after India won by three wickets to clinch the series as well, Cheteshwar Pujara gave a stern reply to both as he defended the call to send Axar before Kohli in the batting line-up. | Cricket
articles.content: Indian team management on Saturday evening made an unusual decision during the start of their final innings against Bangladesh in Dhaka. After the dismissal of Cheteshwar Pujara, head coach Rahul Dra… [+2408 chars]

articles.author: Anna Francis
articles.title: Vettel names former teammate as 'biggest natural talent ever' - Racingnews365.com
articles.description: Sebastian Vettel raced with some illustrious names during his F1 career, but there was one driver in particular whose raw speed particularly impressed him.
articles.content:
Sebastian Vettel believes that Kimi Raikkonen was the "biggest natural talent" he ever came across during his F1 career.
